website_summaries.verdict: A versatile 2-speed, 150 watt immersion blender that comes with 3 interchangeable stainless steel blades.
pros: This fully sealed handheld blender has a submersible length of 9.8 inches and is safe to use in boiling liquids
It has a low speed, a high speed, and features continuous run or pulse action
The included blades are an aerating blade, a blending blade, and a chopping blade
cons: Depending on what you're blending and which blade you are using, clean up can be a little difficult

customer_reviews.title: S blade is an additional purchase
customer_reviews.text: The S Blade is not included in this package, is which is the blade that I need for blending fibrous soups. (My first recipe I tried making with this was Antoni’s roasted butternut squash soup). The blade that I used got celery and onion fibers wrapped around it, and the motor got very hot. It did not work so well for me, but I have faith that with the right blade, it’ll go much better. I’ll update this review once I try this blender with the correct blade. Otherwise, I’m happy with this. I ordered an S blade so that I can make veloute style veggie soups.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. We already have a fancy mixer like this, she insisted that she absolutely had to have this one. In the interest of family harmony, I gave in and ordered this. Must admit, it's very well made, and my wife insists that it's much more powerful than our (less than 1 year) old one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Used Everyday for Years
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our Bamix at the LA County Fair about 14 years ago - Model 133. We use it every day to make protein smoothies and shakes. It has run like a champ. I thought it was pricey when we bought it... but after so many years of heavy use, it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: My Bamix Pro-1 did not have the "S Blade (Slicing) blade (Item 560510)..... It IS mentioned in the manual and all the other blades were included. Other than that the product works very well. Will somebody contact me regards the missing part? I'll let y'all know if they do.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Lieske

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Cuisinart version of this forever and love it. I make salad dressings for my business and thought this would be an improvement on the home kitchen version that Cuisinart makes. It was not. I tried all the blades provided and couldn't get the blending power I wanted and had come accustom to. The Cuisinart on is cheaper and works MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E Gurr

customer_reviews.title: Great stick blender
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bamix stick blender for years and I used almost daily. When it died, I immediately purchased another one. This one is as good as the previous one and I hope it lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got my first Bamix at the fair back in the 1980's. I used it all the time but wasn't as powerful as it was. This is the same, and really not a lot more expensive than the first one was way back then. And the accessories I had fit this one just the same. Some things are better if you just spend the money and get the good one!
customer_reviews.author: Ethelette K

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Mostly works great. A little expensive. Be careful because the all purpose blades ruined my good pans with circular scratches through the teflon coating.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted this.
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted this hand mixer. Finally bought it and I love it. Use it for soups, making mayo, and many other places. A little difficult changing the parts, have to be careful to line them up. But it’s a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have a Bamix back in the home. Bought one 40 years ago and eventually it broke down. Had different ones over the years but was never quite satisfied with them compared to the Bamix.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: not user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Attachments are almost impossible to remove from blender to clean. Blender is difficult to get clean after using it on natural peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Quisquillosa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BLENDER!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use this to make my favorite item: MARGARITAS! Worked wonderful! Chopped up the ice cubes perfectly. Looking forward to using this for many margarita days in the near future and trying for other items/recipes! Definitely worth spending the extra money for a product that does what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: A capable,substantial stick mixer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer.It does the job quickly and easily,cleans up in a snap and hangs in it's holder,ready to go.The only thing I would change would be adding a way to hang the included cup w/ lid so blades could be stored more securely than in the little indentation on the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Smith

customer_reviews.title: solid strong machine but dosen't mix well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems strong but disappointed in use. We went for an upscale, more expensive, model but found it to be lacking in simple everyday uses like mashing cooked cauliflower. Tried all 3 blades but was still disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PVE

customer_reviews.title: A week horse.. Best interesting blender
customer_reviews.text: This is my for immersion blender. Last two have been Bamix. These are work horses. Have the last over to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: MARIANNE

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cooking accessory!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect cooking accessory! I had my previous one for 20 years! This one is an exact replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Pencin

customer_reviews.title: Terrific blender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a previous one that I'd had for 25 years. I was pleased to find the same brand again. It is far superior to many of the less expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Cook

customer_reviews.title: Does not work out of the box, is there a lock I'm not seeing?
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box, plugged it in, pushed the buttons, and the motor spins but the steel shaft and blade does not move at all. Is there a lock or something I need to do to make it spin? Or did I get a defective unit? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a blade for my Bamix immersion blender -- the only blender worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I use my blender every day. I use it to do real things -- not just whip cream and make mayo. The blade is great. The Bamix blender is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Haviland Wright

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Bamix Pro-1 M150 is easy to use and makes smooth and tasty soup very quickly. The only downside is that taking the blades out to clean requires a bit of an effort; we followed the directions and cleaned with hot soapy water on the second attempt, and all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: She is an Executive chef who had a lower priced blender that burned out. She was delighted with this one and couldn't believe the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Barstead

customer_reviews.title: It's not doing a great job with ice cubes - perhaps I expected too ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not doing a great job with ice cubes - perhaps I expected too much. However, it does fine when mixing up already liquid-ey items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: other than that it works like a
customer_reviews.text: I use this one mainly for my glaze cakes, but after using it 4-5 min continuously it warms up a lot.... im not sure if thats normal, other than that it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectations! I'm very happy with this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Blake P

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very quiet. Made some great homemade mayo yesterday adn it makes my morning organic coffee with raw milk and coconut oil like a whipped dream much better than any Starbucks. It is a little pricey so I hope it lasts a while. Made in Switzerland not China
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: Great Stick!
customer_reviews.text: I love this immersion blender! It is a replacement for a cheap-o stick I previously owned. The Bamix has good power, it is lightweight but feels substantial in the hand. It is quiet and easy to clean. The wall bracket is kind of flimsy and the compartment for the blades should be a bit deeper or should have a cover. I feel like the blades are going to fall out, but the quality of the blender makes these just little annoyances, not big deals.
customer_reviews.author: az girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a suitable replacement for my Thunder Stick which died after 15 years of use and no longer is in production. I searched long and hard for a versatile stick appliance that can do it all and the Bamix certainly hasn't disappointed me. I use it for everything....I don't even own a counter top blender or food processor. I would recommend this product in a heart beat. I am even thinking about purchasing a second one for our motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: Kim VanBuskirk

customer_reviews.title: Terriffic blender!
customer_reviews.text: I have had an immersion blender for years. iT IS WORN OUT, so I went on line to find one and you had the BAMIX! Affordable and fantastic! Thank you! People just do not know what they are ;missing without a Bamix in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Ford

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color listed here
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the cheaper white colored immersion blender, not the silver as listed. Otherwise it is a good hand blender.
customer_reviews.author: mmtr3

customer_reviews.title: We Use this every day to make bulletproof coffee, ...
customer_reviews.text: We Use this every day to make bulletproof coffee, comes in handy for soups, milkshakes and blending greens and vitamins into juices as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Everything people say it is
customer_reviews.text: After my old Braun gave up after 20 years of use, I couldn't find another simple stick blender. Some of the new ones have 15 speeds which I can't fathom why anyone would need. The Bamix is beautifully made and quiet in operation. The lower end is all metal and nicely finished. The upper is all sealed and fits the hand perfectly. It is very easy to clean and has more than enough power to do any chore needed of it. Yes, it is more expensive than the made in China equivalent, but this can be used for more than a minute and the quality and attention to detail are obvious.
customer_reviews.author: C.G. Berardi

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and reliable
customer_reviews.text: My first Bamix died a horrible death, being the victim of a science experiment gone awry. Kids, amirite? It was an august 22 years old, and still as reliable as when it was first removed from its box. I’m looking forward to a long and happy relationship with this model. I promise to protect it from harm and children who solemnly swear they are up to no good.
customer_reviews.author: zoomcity

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line in what its made for.
customer_reviews.text: This is highest quality for hand blender. They are smart of how they made with open around blade. So easy to clean down there. Strong motor. Durably built. No toy, no monkey business. It is the best in its class for being a blender and also a mixer. Has power and delivers must faster. a big difference in the food it works with. This is our 7th, because all of the rest are brand names who don't deliver as good as this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Derf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and versatile tool. Like open cage design
customer_reviews.text: The low/high speed buttons are nicely covered by top layer rubber-like soft materials, different from the buttons used in Deluxe model. It’s good for me coz it prevents from accidentally hitting the speed buttons on a lousy countertop. I also bought the processor (wet/dry). Perfect for making one-person breakfast with one banana and half cup peanuts or simply grinding dried nuts before adding to a large portion of mix.
customer_reviews.author: loveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Solid kitchen extra....
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully powerful and absolutely great was to blend in the pot instead of transferring to blender. Took my cream of mushroom soup to a whole new level.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mel

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power and best warranty
customer_reviews.text: The blender arrived promptly in god condition. I have made humus with it and also beaten eggs. It works great. It has plenty of power and has been very quick and easy to clean?
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bamix
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my original after 15 or so years. Used it daily. It took a long time but i just wore it out. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: A Great Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: Whips, blends, chops, cleans in moments and is powerful. Use for smoothies and save your hearing, much quieter than a blender or a bullet.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's easy to grip and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Oro Valley Paradise!

customer_reviews.title: Bamix M 150 Immersion Blender
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a 35-year-old Bamix that finally gave up the ghost. The other Immersion Blenders seemed flimsy by comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAMIX love forever
customer_reviews.text: LOve my bamix......if there ever is a next time i will buy the top end model...this one works fabulous can imagine what the top one is like....and fast fast delivery was a surprise for me....
customer_reviews.author: PamLewis

customer_reviews.title: The best immersion blender
customer_reviews.text: The Bamix immersion blender is a must have in my kitchen. Best thing is they last forever and have so many uses. Polenta has never been easier to make.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is replacing a Bamix Pro I had for over 18 years! Works as expected and hopefully this one lasts as long!
customer_reviews.author: KnitterNatter

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bamix immersion blender
customer_reviews.text: The Bamix Pro-1 M150 just arrived today. I love my Bamix immersion blender, this was bought for our son, he will love it, too. Great service, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: AWF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second one I've owned, last one lasted 20 plus years.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best one on the market for the Money
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS stand mixer!!!! Best one on the market for the Money!!!
customer_reviews.author: oers0815

product_meta.title: Bamix M150 Mono Pro-1 NSF Professional – 2-speed Immersion Hand Blender, NSF certified, 150W 120V 60Hz with US-plug - Light Grey - Includes 3 Stainless Steel Blades
feature_bullets: INTERCHANGEABLE BLADES: Aerating, blending and chopping blade - multiple appliances all in one.
POWERFUL AND PRECISE: A powerful 150-watt A/C motor keeps constant, precise speed under heavy loads.
HEAT RESISTANT: With high torque, you can submerge our 5.3-in blender shaft even in boiling liquids.
NSF RATED: Our commercial pro series is perfect for professional cooking projects.

HANDBUILT IN SWITZERLAND: Whether you are a professional chef or home cook, our commercial blender will get any cooking job done. Swiss-made, our blender includes a US plug, 3 interchangeable blades, and a wall bracket for easy storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
